E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 5/19/1975
Subject: Progress of Mike T. Stanton
Dear Sir,
Mike T. Stanton is doing pretty good at A Fort Lauderdale Yankees!
He has an ERA of 3.00, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Tuesday, 5/20/1975
Subject: Extension?
Dear Sir,
I am really enjoying playing for your team.
I would be interested in a contract extension!
How about you?

Regards,
Jack Hiatt
